## IReadLinesFromIterableOptions interface

Options used when calling the [Text.readLinesFromIterable()](./node-core-library.text.readlinesfromiterable.md) or [Text.readLinesFromIterableAsync()](./node-core-library.text.readlinesfromiterableasync.md) methods.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IReadLinesFromIterableOptions 
```

_(Optional)_ The encoding of the input iterable. The default is utf8.

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ If true, empty lines will not be returned. The default is false.
